attributes.action: Elect an immediate successor to David Cameron or activate E.U. article 50.
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron has decided to resign. A 2 month period of uncertainty and limbo is unacceptable to the British people or the E.U.
The process for leaving the E.U. must be started for the benefit of the people, the country and the economy.
We need the government to provide immediate and positive show of strength in our politics to prove to the world and to its people that democracy has spoken ant the cogs must start to turn, with a leader that has the same directional aim as the majority.
attributes.background: People of Britain. David Cameron has decided to resign. This is acceptable, However a 2 month period of leave is not. He has no interest in proceeding with article 50 which would start the process of leaving the E.U. as promised. We are a country on the verge of greatness and we need a new leader.

rejection.details: This petition is no longer relevant - Theresa May has now been appointed as Prime Minister.
